title: МОНИТОР DELL 25" G2524H FHD 280HZ, HDMI, DP, USB
description:
Монитор
Екран:25"(63.5cm) FHD 280Hz
Резолуција:1920 x 1080
Contrast Ratio (dynamic):1.000:1
Flat screen
Fast IPS
Aspect Ratio:16:9
Осветленост:400cd/m2

NVIDIA G-SYNC Compatible

HDMI (HDCP 1.4)
2 x DisplayPort 1.4 (HDCP 1.4)
USB 3.2 Gen 1 upstream
USB 3.2 Gen 1 downstream with Battery Charging 1.2
USB 3.2 Gen 1 downstream

Tilt Angle: -5°/+21°
Height Adjustment: 5.1 in
Swivel Angle: -45°/+45°
VESA Mounting Interface: 100mm
